articles.author: Jack Guy
articles.title: James Harrison, blood donor whose rare plasma saved millions of babies, dead at 88 - CNN
articles.description: James Harrison, a prolific Australian blood donor famed for having saved the lives of more than two million babies, has died at age 88.
articles.content:
James Harrison, a prolific Australian blood donor famed for having saved the lives of more than two million babies, has died at age 88.
Harrison, whose plasma contained a rare and precious antibody … [+2845 chars]
